name: Anthony DELOATCH, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Deloatch v. Court of Common Pleas Philadelphia County

parties: Anthony DELOATCH, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 29th day of September, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is GRANTED to the extent it seeks mandamus relief, and the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is DIRECTED to dispose of Petitioner’s pending filings within 90 days.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
123 A.3d 328
Anthony DELOATCH, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.
No. 97 EM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 29, 2015.
